targets.expr:
sum (kube_pod_status_phase {phase="Running",namespace=~"$namespace"} * on (pod) group_left sum (kube_pod_container_info{image=~".*iib-curio.*",namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod))
/
(
  sum (kube_pod_status_phase {phase!="Running",namespace=~"$namespace"} * on (pod) group_left sum (kube_pod_container_info{image=~".*iib-curio.*",namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod))
  +
  sum (kube_pod_status_phase {phase="Running",namespace=~"$namespace"} * on (pod) group_left sum (kube_pod_container_info{image=~".*iib-curio.*",namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod)))

sum by (phase,sigla) (kube_pod_status_phase {phase!="Running",namespace=~"$namespace"} * on (pod) group_left sum (kube_pod_container_info{image=~".*iib-curio.*",namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod)) > 0
sum by (phase) (kube_pod_status_phase {phase="Running",namespace=~"$namespace"} * on (pod) group_left sum (kube_pod_container_info{image=~".*iib-curio.*",namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod)) > 0
